name: 技术元数据
description: 摄影技术相关的通用标签

tags.name: 广角
tags.vector_description: Wide angle lens, 14-35mm focal length, wide field of view, expansive perspective

tags.name: 标准焦距
tags.vector_description: Standard lens, 35-70mm focal length, natural perspective, normal view

tags.name: 长焦
tags.vector_description: Telephoto lens, 70-200mm+ focal length, compressed perspective, distant subjects

tags.name: 小光圈
tags.vector_description: Small aperture, f/8-f/22, deep depth of field, sharp throughout

tags.name: 大光圈
tags.vector_description: Large aperture, f/1.2-f/2.8, shallow depth of field, background blur

tags.name: 低感光度
tags.vector_description: Low ISO, ISO 50-400, clean image, minimal noise

tags.name: 高感光度
tags.vector_description: High ISO, ISO 1600+, low light capable, possible grain

tags.name: 浅景深
tags.vector_description: Shallow depth of field, blurred background, subject isolation, bokeh

tags.name: 深景深
tags.vector_description: Deep depth of field, everything in focus, front to back sharpness

tags.name: 散景
tags.vector_description: Bokeh, out of focus highlights, creamy blur, background blur quality

tags.name: 锐利
tags.vector_description: Sharp, crisp, in focus, high detail, tack sharp

tags.name: 柔焦
tags.vector_description: Soft focus, dreamy, slightly out of focus, diffused, glow effect

tags.name: 调色
tags.vector_description: Color grading, color correction, mood through color, cinematic color

tags.name: 修图
tags.vector_description: Retouching, skin smoothing, blemish removal, photo editing

tags.name: 合成

tags.name: 加深减淡

tags.name: 胶片模拟
tags.vector_description: Film emulation, film look, analog aesthetic, vintage color

tags.name: 低饱和
tags.vector_description: Desaturated, muted colors, low saturation, faded look

tags.name: 交叉冲印
tags.vector_description: Cross process, experimental color, unusual color shifts, alternative processing

tags.name: 分离调色
tags.vector_description: Split toning, different colors in highlights and shadows, tonal contrast

tags.name: 横幅

tags.name: 竖幅
